channel.title: Help!
channel.description: When i am on a client for like 10 seconds i get this. [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/5etifa.jpg[/img] Can someone tell me how to fix this I have tried like everything i know. This is what i have when i hit edit on RUN TITLE Client @echo off cls java -Xmx800M EGUI pause

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @young_pure42 young pure42
item.description:
@young_pure42 wrote:

When i am on a client for like 10 seconds i get this.

Can someone tell me how to fix this I have tried like everything i know.
This is what i have when i hit edit on RUN
TITLE Client
@echo off
cls
java -Xmx800M EGUI
pause
